column4: who can help me with gcc?
Don't ask to ask, just ask.
im having trouble trying to open a file on my desktop with gcc, i havent added or played with the dir's...
GCC is a compiler - try it from the command line.
that is how im running gcc, but when i type gcc small.c
Warning: include(layouts/) [function.include]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home2/thelosan/public_html/wp-content/themes/gazette/home.php on line 16

Warning: include() [function.include]: Failed opening 'layouts/' for inclusion (include_path='.:/usr/lib/php:/usr/local/lib/php') in /home2/thelosan/public_html/wp-content/themes/gazette/home.php on line 16
gcc: small.c: No such file or directory
You're trying to compile PHP with GCC?
By default, terminals open in your home directory. The Desktop is a folder, inside your home dir.
